name: Swing Chimp
description:
Swing from vine to vine as a monkey! Get the highest score!

In this arcade game the goal is to get the highest score by jumping from vine to vine!
Beware not to miss though, or the monkey will fall into the water.

Tap anywhere on the screen to jump, but be careful to time it right. Jump too early, and you might fall. Jump too late, you might fall too!
